# Indl√¶ser data
```{r}



data <- get(load("armdata.Rdata"))[5][[1]]
pers1 <- data[[1]][[2]]
person <- 10
rep <- 10
x <- c()
y <- c()
z <- c()
for (p in 1:person){
  for (r in 1:rep){
    
    longitude <- data[[p]][[r]][,1]
    x <- cbind(x,longitude)
  }
}
for (p in 1:person){
  for (r in 1:rep){
    
    transversal <- data[[p]][[r]][,2]
    y <- cbind(y,transversal)
  }
}
for (p in 1:person){
  for (r in 1:rep){
    
    vertical <- data[[p]][[r]][,3]
    z <- cbind(z,vertical)
  }
}

```

## Rename data

```{r}
names(data) <- paste0("person_", 1:10)
 
for (per in c(1:length(data))) {
  names(data[[per]]) <- paste0("repetion_", 1:10)
  for (rep in c(1:length(data[[per]]))) {
    colnames(data[[per]][[rep]]) <- c("x", "y", "z")
  }
}
```
